section.name: Built-in directives
section.p: Directives are probably the most useful part in anycode generation. A directive is a class focused on one specific language code generation and that is available as a variable from any of your template. Here is the list of available variables :

tr.td: Supply functions to render attributes, operations and class signature in Java Language

Provide few useful functions to make dependency wiring easier.
First version of Objective-C directive. This directive is recent and provides very basic functions to help generate Objective-C code. Please see Objective-C tutorial for further details.
